sentences.sentence: Carbon reduction through reforestation and avoided deforestation.
sentences.translation: 通过植树造林和避免乱砍滥伐减少碳排放。

sentences.sentence: All of this makes the net benefit of reforestation extremely difficult to measure.
sentences.translation: 所有这一切都使得重新造林的纯利益极难估算。

sentences.sentence: But reforestation projects have higher hurdles to cross than other types of carbon-offset projects.
sentences.translation: 与其它类型的碳补偿项目相比，造林项目要跨越的障碍更大。
